decision_conditions:
The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved drawings and documents:
Material Samples Inc. Schedule, Images and planning Elevations â€“ Issue 1 (September 2019)

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
description: Details pursuant to condition 4 (material samples) of planning permission 18/0201/FULOPDC dated 23/07/2019 for erection of two buildings between six, ten, twelve and fourteen storeys (min. c. 20.1m and max. c. 46.1m above ground level) comprising 105 residential units and 280 sqm of commercial floorspace (Use Classes A1/A2/A3/A4/B1/D1/D2), public open space, accessible parking, cycle storage, landscaping and related ancillary works.
